00051 class GPC_KeyboardDevice : public SCA_IInputDevice
00052 {
00053 protected:
00054 
00059     std::map<int, KX_EnumInputs> m_reverseKeyTranslateTable;
00060     short   m_exitkey;
00061 
00062 public:
00063     bool m_hookesc;
00064     GPC_KeyboardDevice()
00065         : m_hookesc(false)
00066     {
00067     }
00068 
00069     virtual ~GPC_KeyboardDevice(void)
00070     {
00071     }
00072 
00073     virtual bool IsPressed(SCA_IInputDevice::KX_EnumInputs inputcode)
00074     {
00075         return false;
00076     }
00077 
00078     virtual void NextFrame();
00079     
00080     virtual KX_EnumInputs ToNative(int incode)
00081     {
00082         return m_reverseKeyTranslateTable[incode];
00083     }
00084 
00085     virtual bool ConvertEvent(int incode, int val);
00086     
00087     virtual void HookEscape();
00088 };
